title: What Does the 🙇 (Person Bowing) Emoji Mean?

steps.title: The 🙇 emoji most often symbolizes respect and gratitude.
steps.content: The 🙇 emoji most often symbolizes respect and gratitude. Also known as dogeza (土下座) in Japan, a person bowing deeply is used to show respect to someone older or of higher status, to express an apology , or to request a large favor . In other cultures, it can represent praying or being extremely thankful. [1] X Research source For example: Thank you for coming to the wedding, grandma 🙇❤️ I started praying every morning and it has changed my life 🙇🙏 Could you do a huge favor for me and pick up Andy from daycare? 🙇🙇🙇 I’m sorry for accusing you of cheating. I misread the situation, and I feel terrible 🙇

steps.title: The 🙇‍♂️ or 🙇‍♀️ emojis may also symbolize oral sex.
steps.content: The 🙇‍♂️ or 🙇‍♀️ emojis may also symbolize oral sex. If you’re texting your partner or FWB, the 🙇‍♂️ (man bowing) or 🙇‍♀️ (woman bowing) emojis can be sexually suggestive. Use either one alone or string them together with other sexy emojis to turn up the heat. [2] X Research source Example texts: Can’t wait till you come over 🙇‍♂️ You’re going get it later 🙇‍♀️🫦💥😏 I hope you’re ready for a nice treat after work 🙇‍♀️👅💦

steps.title: Use the 🙇 emoji to show respect or deference.
steps.content: Use the 🙇 emoji to show respect or deference. If you’re texting someone you admire, send them the 🙇 emoji at the beginning or end of the conversation. It can be used like the 👋 (waving hand) emoji to say hello or goodbye in a polite manner, plus show that you enjoyed speaking with them. [3] X Research source Example texts: Greetings, Samantha 🙇 Hello, Jonathan 🙇 How are you doing today? It was so lovely chatting with you! Have an amazing rest of your day 🙇

steps.title: Send the 🙇 emoji if you need to request a big favor.
steps.content: Send the 🙇 emoji if you need to request a big favor. Whether you want to borrow a friend’s car or ask a close colleague to cover for you, the 🙇 emoji is one of the best ways to request for help. [4] X Research source Be sure to ask the other person politely and offer them an incentive if they seem hesitant—adding some cute emojis may also sweeten your text! For example: Could you please pick me up from the airport? 🙇💝🥺 Would it be possible for you to turn in my paper on Friday? 🙇 I’d really appreciate it if you could go over the slides with me 🙇 I can bring cookies! 😋

steps.title: Text the 🙇 emoji if you want to give a sincere apology.
steps.content: Text the 🙇 emoji if you want to give a sincere apology. Looking to express genuine remorse and beg someone for forgiveness? The 🙇 emoji is the perfect way to say you’re sorry , especially when paired with a thoughtful message that shows accountability for your actions. Example texts: I’m really sorry for forgetting to pick you up 🙇 I’m sorry for how I treated you 🙇 I promise I will find a way to make it up to you! I feel terrible for what I said to you earlier. I know there’s no excuse, but I’m sorry 🙇

steps.title: Drop the 🙇 emoji to thank someone and express gratitude.
steps.content: Drop the 🙇 emoji to thank someone and express gratitude. Did someone surprise you with a gift or go out of their way to help you? Send the 🙇 emoji to show your appreciation! [5] X Research source It’s another way of saying, “I’m super grateful for you and all that you do.” Example texts: I just got your gift in the mail! Thank you 🙇 Thank you so much for helping me out 🙇 It means the world ❤️🌎 Thanks for picking me up from the party 🙇 I seriously owe you one!

steps.title: Use the 🙇 emoji to indicate you’re praying or performing a religious act.
steps.content: Use the 🙇 emoji to indicate you’re praying or performing a religious act. No matter what religion you practice, the 🙇 emoji can show you’re connected to your spiritual side. Send it to a friend or family member when you’re at church, in the middle of fasting, or praying at the temple. [6] X Research source For example: I’m heading to the mosque 🙇🕌 I’ll call you in an hour! I’m still at church 🙇⛪🙏 I went on the most incredible retreat this weekend 🙇🧿✨

steps.title: Send the 🙇‍♂️ or 🙇‍♀️ emojis when sexting someone you’re attracted to.
steps.content: Send the 🙇‍♂️ or 🙇‍♀️ emojis when sexting someone you’re attracted to. Trying to turn someone on over text? Use any variation of the bowing emoji to suggest you want to engage in oral sex. It’s flirty, direct, and sure to get them in the mood! [7] X Research source For example: You’re not ready for me 🙇‍♂️😈🙇‍♂️😈 Just a preview of your birthday present: 🙇‍♀️🙇‍♀️🙇‍♀️ You just made my day ❤️ You’re definitely getting a reward later 😉🙇‍♂️🧠

steps.title: Use the 🙇 emoji if you’re about to hit the gym or get a massage.
steps.content: Use the 🙇 emoji if you’re about to hit the gym or get a massage. Some people misinterpret the bowing emoji to mean they’re doing pushups or lying down to get a massage. [8] X Research source Drop a 🙇 if you’re on a health and wellness kick and want to tell everyone you’re serious about it! Example texts: I’m DEAD. I just did 100 pushups 🙇 Peep my fitness journey on TikTok 👀🙇 I’m about to get a deep tissue massage 🙇

steps.title: The 🙇 emoji was added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.
steps.content: The 🙇 emoji was added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. It was officially approved as part of Unicode 6.0 on October 11, 2010. [9] X Research source The 🙇‍♀️ (woman bowing) and 🙇‍♂️ (man bowing) emojis were added to Emoji 4.0 on November 28, 2016, along with new gendered emojis and emoji skin tones. [10] X Research source

steps.title: The 🙇 emoji’s Unicode is U+1F647.
steps.content: The 🙇 emoji’s Unicode is U+1F647. If you need to display the bowing emoji in your HTML code, type in “&#x1F647.” [11] X Research source Some fonts, like Twemoji and EmojiOne, include a wide range of emojis you can use, as long as you include a reference to the font in your HTML code and use the corresponding character code. If you want to copy and paste the 🙇 emoji on your computer, highlight the emoji, right-click the mouse or trackpad, and hit “Copy.” Then, right-click where you want to place the emoji and select “Paste.”

steps.title: The 🙇 emoji goes great with gesture, body part, and religious emojis.
steps.content: The 🙇 emoji goes great with gesture, body part, and religious emojis. From the facepalm emoji to the praying hands emoji , there are tons of ways to express your emotions. Use any of the following emojis to spice up a conversation over text , or combine them with the 🙇 emoji to convey messages without using words: 🕊️ (dove) ⛪ (church) ✝️ (Latin cross) 🤝 (handshake) 🫡 (saluting face) 🙏 (folded hands) 📿 (prayer beads) 🥺 (pleading face) 🙌 (raising hands) 🤷 (person shrugging) 🤦 (person facepalming) 🙆 (person gesturing OK) 😇 (smiling face with halo) 💆 (person getting massage)
